## User Story

**As a** user  
**I want** to perform an action  
**So that** I can achieve a goal  

---

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Feature works correctly
- [ ] Data is stored in database
- [ ] API response is correct
- [ ] UI displays proper output
